message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $13,000 for it.  Let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the value it holds, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it. Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Bob, I understand your offer. While I appreciate your interest, I need to be closer to $12,000 to make this work for me. I'm confident that this product will be of significant value to you.  Let's see if we can find a solution that benefits both of us.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to go above $10,000 for this product. I hope this aligns better with your needs.
